EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Application Access Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There is a request from user to get access to below specified application: Contact Name: {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Contact_Name__c} Application: {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Application_Name__c} To review this request, click the button below.
View Request
If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click here.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
